dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.text: You know how my tapes sell.  People eat this stuff up.

dialogue.speaker: MALE VOICE
dialogue.text: I had three jerkoffs trying to return your tapes last month.  Do you know how bad a skin flick has to be for some jackass to come back into my place with a fucking receipt, and try to fucking return it?

dialogue.speaker: EDDIE
dialogue.text: Maybe there's something wrong with the scumbag customers coming into your place, ever think of that?

dialogue.speaker: MALE VOICE
dialogue.text: The only thing wrong is the cheap, softcore crap you're peddling, Eddie.  Where do you get this stuff?

dialogue.speaker: MALE VOICE
dialogue.text: Get together some upscale product where the girls still have teeth in their head.  Till then, fuck you.
